text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: No Prophet will come after me. I am the last prophet of ALLAH.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: One who love Hazrat Ali (R.A) love me.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: It is obligatory to all Muslims (girls & boys) to seek knowledge (education).
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Namaz (Salah) is the 2nd pillar of Islam.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The most beloved deeds to Allah are those that are consistent, even if they are few.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The strong man is not the one who can wrestle, but the strong man is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The best of you are those who are best to their families, and I am the best of you to my family.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The believer does not slander, curse, or speak in an obscene or foul manner.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The best charity is that given by one who has little.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The best of people are those that bring most benefit to the rest of mankind.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The seeking of knowledge is obligatory for every Muslim.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever is not kind has no faith.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Allah does not look at your appearance or your wealth, but He looks at your hearts and your deeds.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The world is a prison for the believer and a paradise for the disbeliever.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Make things easy, and do not make them difficult, and give good tidings and do not make people run away.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: He who does not show mercy to others will not be shown mercy.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Beware of envy, for it devours good deeds just as fire devours wood.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Do not waste water, even if you perform your ablution on the banks of an abundantly-flowing river.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The best of you is he who learns the Quran and teaches it.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: The best jihad is to speak a word of justice to an oppressive ruler.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)

text: Modesty brings nothing except good.
author: Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
